name: Free Starter Bundle
description: This introductory package is completely free and includes a basic cleaning service and a brief event consultation session to get you started.

name: Basic Bundle
description: This package includes a one-time cleaning service and an event consultation session.

name: Premium Bundle
description: This package includes a cleaning service, event management, and one free tutoring session.

name: Ultimate Bundle
description: The Ultimate Bundle offers all our services at a discounted rate. Includes cleaning, event management, and tutoring sessions plus a free consultation for additional services.

name: VIP Bundle
description: This all-inclusive package provides cleaning, event management, personalized tutoring sessions, and ongoing consultations for future events and services.
services: Ongoing consultations for future events and services
